name: octazooka
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 50% chance to lower the target’s accuracy by one stage.
short_effect: Has a 50% chance to lower the target’s accuracy by one stage.

flavor_text.black_white: The user attacks by spraying ink in the target’s face or eyes. It may also lower the target’s accuracy.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user attacks by spraying ink in the target’s face or eyes. It may also lower the target’s accuracy.
